mapper.select: SELECT id, name, price, image, item_number, uid, remark, district, imageUrls FROM items WHERE delflag = 0 ORDER BY id LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{pageNum}

SELECT id, name, price, image, item_number, uid, remark, district, imageUrls, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM items WHERE delflag = 0
AND type LIKE CONCAT('%', #{type}, '%')
AND district LIKE CONCAT('%', #{district}, '%')
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') ) AS totalItems FROM items WHERE delflag = 0
AND type LIKE CONCAT('%', #{type}, '%')
AND district LIKE CONCAT('%', #{district}, '%')
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT
FROM items WHERE uid = #{uid} and delflag = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO items (name, price, item_number, imageUrls,image, type, district, remark, uid, provider, delflag, realQuantity, realPrice) VALUES (#{name}, #{price}, #{itemNumber}, #{imageUrls},#{image}, #{type}, #{district}, #{remark}, #{uid}, #{provider}, 0, #{realQuantity}, #{realPrice})
mapper.update: UPDATE items SET delflag = 1 WHERE uid = #{uid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO solded_item (price, number, uid, district, type, source, name,instime) VALUES (#{price}, #{number}, #{uid}, #{district},#{type},#{source},#{name},#{instime})
mapper.select: SELECT a.district, SUM(a.number * a.price) AS totalprice FROM solded_item a GROUP BY a.district;
SELECT a.source, b.sourceName, SUM(a.number * a.price) AS totalprice FROM solded_item a LEFT JOIN dm_source b ON a.source = b.source GROUP BY a.source, b.sourceName;

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(instime) = CURDATE() THEN number * price ELSE 0 END) AS dailySales, SUM(CASE WHEN YEAR(instime) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(instime) = MONTH(CURDATE()) THEN number * price ELSE 0 END) AS monthklySales, SUM(CASE WHEN YEAR(instime) = YEAR(CURDATE()) THEN number * price ELSE 0 END) AS annualSales, SUM(number * price) AS historicalSales FROM solded_item;
